abstract: Bridge Records, founded by guitarist David Starobin, has become the granddaddy of American independent classical labels in the 30 years since it released its first disc; label is one of few healthy survivors of a turbulent music industry.
snippet: Started 30 years ago partly to produce classical albums by its founder, the guitarist David Starobin, Bridge Records is a healthy survivor in a turbulent recording industry.
lead_paragraph: Started 30 years ago partly to produce classical albums by its founder, the guitarist David Starobin, Bridge Records is a healthy survivor in a turbulent recording industry.

headline.main: Holding Onto a Niche, Very Firmly
headline.print_headline: Holding Onto a Niche, Very Firmly
headline.seo: Bridge Records Holds Onto Its Niche, With a Very Firm Grip
